name: pkg_overrideghsvs

update.elementComment: Special for packages. If set overrides element=filename
update.updateFilePrefixComment: Abweichender Dateiname auf Upadate-Repo? Wenn nicht gesetzt wird name verwendet.
update.pkgIdComment: Set in packageOverride.json! The id element in <file ..> tag of each child(!) package. The id= MUST be set to the value of the element column in the #__extensions table.

description: Joomla package/file. A collection of overrides for Joomla 4 that I often use. Not more.
